SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Interface Server

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerImpl, ServerStub
public interface Server extends Remote
This interface represents the Game's server. It contains a series of methods used by the clients to notify the Server of some client-related events. Also contains methods for server management and server's events in game handling.
See Also:
  • Client
  • Server
  • ServerImpl
  • Game
  • Player

    • changeTurn

      void changeTurn() throws RemoteException
      Change the turn in the server's context.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a connection error occurs
      See Also:
      • OnGoingState.changeTurn(String, String)

    • insertUserInputIntoModel

      void insertUserInputIntoModel(Choice playerChoice) throws RemoteException
      Allows to insert Tiles, in a given order (contained in Choice) into the Board .
      Parameters:
      playerChoice - the choice made by the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - called if a communication error occurs.
      See Also:
      • Player
      • Board
      • Choice

    • sendPrivateMessage

      void sendPrivateMessage(String receiver, String sender, String content) throws RemoteException
      This method is used to stream a message privately. Only the specified receiver will be able to read the message in any chat. It builds a new object message at each call, setting the nicknames of the receiving Players and its message type to PRIVATE.
      Parameters:
      receiver - the Player receiving the message.
      sender - the Player sending the message.
      content - the text of the message being sent.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - called if a communication error occurs.
      See Also:
      • Player
      • Player.getNickname()
      • Message.messageType()

    • sendBroadcastMessage

      void sendBroadcastMessage(String sender, String content) throws RemoteException
      This method implementations allow to send broadcast messages to all the Players.
      Parameters:
      sender - the sender of the broadcast Message.
      content - the text of the message.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - called if a communication error occurs.
      See Also:
      • Player
      • Message

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(Client client, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      This method is used to add a Player to the current Game through the knowledge of the nickname he has chosen during game creation and the client he has been assigned to.
      Parameters:
      client - is the player's client
      nickname - is the reference for the name of the Player being added.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - called if a communication error occurs.

    • disconnectPlayer

      void disconnectPlayer(String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Disconnects the selected Player from the Game by changing his connectivity state. (only possible when the Game has already started).
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname identifying the player selected for disconnection.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - called if a communication error occurs.
      See Also:
      • Player
      • Game
      • Player.setConnected(boolean)

    • register

      void register(Client client, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Method used by the clients in order to register to a specific remote server.
      Parameters:
      client - is the client registering to the server.
      nickname - the player's nickname related to the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - called if a communication error occurs.
      RemoteException - called if a communication error occurs.
